seller_research.name: Whatfix
seller_research.description: Whatfix is an Indian SaaS-based digital adoption platform that provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software.
use_cases: Effective training and better support to users

pricing_models.description: Basic plan for small to medium-sized businesses

buyer_research.name: Schneider Electric
buyer_research.description: Schneider Electric is a global industrial technology leader bringing world-leading expertise in electrification, automation and digitization to its customers

competitors.name: WalkMe
pros: Offers a range of features designed to enhance user engagement and streamline the user experience
Has more to offer in training and guidance capabilities
cons: Requires a lot of setup and customization
differentiators: More focused on employee-facing use cases
Has a greater range of analytics and feedback options

competitors.name: Pendo
pros: Has comprehensive voice of the customer features
cons: Can be more expensive than Whatfix
differentiators: More focused on customer-facing use cases
Has a greater range of analytics and feedback options

pains: How can Whatfix help Schneider Electric to achieve their sustainability and energy efficiency goals?
What kind of ROI can we expect from investing in Whatfix's digital adoption platform?
How does Whatfix address the challenges of decarbonization and stakeholder engagement?
Can Whatfix help us improve customer experience and reduce churn?
How does Whatfix integrate with our existing systems and tools?
What kind of customization and support does Whatfix offer for large-scale enterprises like Schneider Electric?
objections: Whatfix seems expensive, how does the pricing model justify the cost?
We're already using another digital adoption platform, how does Whatfix differentiate itself?
We're not sure if our employees will adopt the new platform, how does Whatfix ensure user adoption?
Whatfix seems to have a steep learning curve, how does the platform provide support for users?
How does Whatfix address our data management challenges and ensure data security?

messages.content: Hi, thank you for taking the time to speak with me today. I'm excited to learn more about Schneider Electric's goals and challenges. Can you start by telling me a little bit about your role and what brings you to this call?

Hi, I'm John, the Head of Digital Transformation at Schneider Electric. We're always looking for ways to improve our customer experience and increase energy efficiency. We've been exploring digital adoption platforms to help us achieve these goals. I'm interested in learning more about Whatfix and how it can help us.

That's great to hear, John. We've had success with similar companies in the industrial technology space. Can you tell me more about what you mean by improving customer experience and increasing energy efficiency? What specific pain points are you trying to address?

Well, we've noticed that our customers are having trouble navigating our software, which is leading to a high churn rate. We're also struggling to reduce our carbon footprint and meet our sustainability goals. We're looking for a solution that can help us address these challenges.

I understand. It sounds like you're facing some common challenges in the industry. Whatfix's digital adoption platform can help you improve customer experience and increase energy efficiency. We've seen ROI of up to 300% with our customers. Would you like me to walk you through a demo of our platform and show you how it can help address your pain points?

Yes, that would be great. I'd love to see how Whatfix can help us achieve our goals. But before we move forward, can you tell me more about your pricing model and how it would work for a large-scale enterprise like ours?

Absolutely. Our pricing model is based on the number of users and the level of customization you need. We have a tiered pricing structure, with discounts for larger enterprises. We also offer a free trial and a pilot program to help you test our platform and see the ROI for yourself. We're confident that our platform can help you achieve your goals and we're willing to work with you to customize a plan that fits your needs.

That sounds reasonable. I'd like to discuss this further with our team and explore how Whatfix can help us achieve our goals. What's the next step in the process and what kind of support can we expect from Whatfix?

I'm glad you're interested in moving forward. The next step would be to schedule a follow-up call to discuss the pilot program and answer any further questions you may have. We'll also provide you with a customized proposal outlining the scope of work, timeline, and pricing. You'll have a dedicated customer success manager to ensure a smooth implementation and to provide ongoing support. We're committed to helping you achieve your goals and we're confident that our platform can make a significant impact.

decision_committee: John, the Head of Digital Transformation at Schneider Electric

Can you tell me more about what you mean by improving customer experience and increasing energy efficiency? What specific pain points are you trying to address?

We have a tiered pricing structure, with discounts for larger enterprises. We also offer a free trial and a pilot program to help you test our platform and see the ROI for yourself.

We'll provide you with a customized proposal outlining the scope of work, timeline, and pricing. You'll have a dedicated customer success manager to ensure a smooth implementation and to provide ongoing support.

insights: Improving customer experience and increasing energy efficiency are key goals for Schneider Electric
Schneider Electric is struggling with high churn rates and reducing carbon footprint
Schneider Electric is interested in exploring digital adoption platforms to achieve their goals
improvements: Provide more clarity on pricing and customization options
Offer a more personalized demo to address specific pain points
Emphasize the ROI and benefits of implementing Whatfix's digital adoption platform

features.name: Digital Adoption Platform
features.description: A platform that provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software to enhance user experience and software adoption.

features.name: Interactive Guides
features.description: Guides that enable users to learn and adapt to new software applications and features through interactive and immersive experiences.

features.name: Flows
features.description: A feature that helps users navigate complex software applications and complete tasks efficiently by providing step-by-step guidance.

features.name: In-app Guidance
features.description: Contextual and real-time guidance provided within the software application to help users overcome learning curves and adopt new features.

features.name: Training
features.description: Personalized and interactive training experiences that help users develop skills and proficiency in using software applications.

features.name: Performance Support
features.description: Real-time support and feedback provided to users within the software application to help them complete tasks efficiently and effectively.

features.name: Analytics
features.description: Insights and analytics provided to help organizations measure the effectiveness of their digital adoption strategy and identify areas for improvement.

messages.content: Hello, John. It's great to have you and the Schneider Electric team on the call today. I'm excited to showcase how Whatfix's digital adoption platform can address your pain points and help you achieve your goals.

messages.user: John, Head of Digital Transformation at Schneider Electric
messages.content: Thanks for having us. We're looking forward to seeing how Whatfix can help us improve customer experience and increase energy efficiency.

Absolutely. Before we dive into the demo, I just want to confirm that we're on the same page regarding your goals and pain points. You mentioned during our previous discovery call that you're struggling with high churn rates, reducing carbon footprint, and meeting sustainability goals. Can you tell me a little bit more about what you mean by these challenges and how they're impacting your business?

messages.user: John, Head of Digital Transformation at Schneider Electric
messages.content: Yes, certainly. Our customers are having trouble navigating our software, which is leading to high churn rates. We're also struggling to reduce our carbon footprint and meet our sustainability goals. We believe that improving customer experience and increasing energy efficiency are key to addressing these challenges.

I understand. Our digital adoption platform is designed to help organizations like yours overcome these challenges. Let me show you how our features can address your pain points. First, I'd like to demonstrate our Interactive Guides, which enable users to learn and adapt to new software applications and features through interactive and immersive experiences. This feature can help reduce churn rates by providing users with a personalized onboarding experience.

messages.user: John, Head of Digital Transformation at Schneider Electric
messages.content: That sounds interesting. Can you show me how it works?

Of course. (demonstrates Interactive Guides feature) As you can see, our Interactive Guides provide step-by-step guidance and real-time feedback to users, helping them complete tasks efficiently and effectively. We've seen significant reductions in churn rates and increases in customer satisfaction with our clients who have implemented this feature.

messages.user: John, Head of Digital Transformation at Schneider Electric
messages.content: That's impressive. How does your platform handle customization and implementation? We have a complex software application, and we're concerned about the time and resources required to implement your platform.

I completely understand your concerns. We'll provide you with a customized proposal outlining the scope of work, timeline, and pricing. You'll have a dedicated customer success manager to ensure a smooth implementation and to provide ongoing support. We've worked with numerous large-scale enterprises like yours, and we're confident that we can meet your customization and implementation needs.

messages.user: John, Head of Digital Transformation at Schneider Electric
messages.content: Okay, that sounds reassuring. What kind of ROI can we expect from implementing your platform?

Our clients have seen significant ROI from implementing our digital adoption platform. For example, one of our clients in the energy sector saw a 30% reduction in churn rates and a 25% increase in customer satisfaction. We can provide you with a customized ROI calculation based on your specific needs and goals.

Before we wrap up the demo, I'd like to highlight a few more features that I think would be particularly beneficial for Schneider Electric. Our Analytics feature provides insights and analytics to help organizations measure the effectiveness of their digital adoption strategy and identify areas for improvement. Our Training feature offers personalized and interactive training experiences to help users develop skills and proficiency in using software applications. And our Performance Support feature provides real-time support and feedback to users within the software application to help them complete tasks efficiently and effectively.

messages.user: John, Head of Digital Transformation at Schneider Electric
messages.content: Those features sound useful. How do we get started with implementing your platform?

We can provide you with a customized proposal outlining the scope of work, timeline, and pricing. We also offer a free trial and a pilot program to help you test our platform and see the ROI for yourself. Let's discuss the next steps and answer any remaining questions you may have.

During the demo, I used the following assets: a presentation outlining the features and benefits of our digital adoption platform, a video showcasing our Interactive Guides feature, and a document highlighting our success stories and case studies. I'll send these assets to you via email for your reference.
Before we close, I just want to confirm that we've addressed your pain points and concerns. Are there any remaining objections or questions you have regarding our digital adoption platform?

messages.user: John, Head of Digital Transformation at Schneider Electric
messages.content: No, I think we've covered everything. Thank you for the demo and for addressing our concerns.

You're welcome. It was great demoing our digital adoption platform for you today. I'll send over the next steps and a customized proposal. Let's schedule a follow-up call to discuss further. Thank you again for your time today.

messages.content: Hello John, thank you for taking the time to discuss the pricing of our digital adoption platform. I hope you found the demo we provided earlier helpful in understanding how our solution can address your pain points, particularly in improving customer experience and increasing energy efficiency.

messages.user: John, Head of Digital Transformation at Schneider Electric
messages.content: Yes, thank you for the demo. We're interested in exploring the possibilities of implementing your platform, but we do have some concerns about the pricing model.

Absolutely, I'm happy to walk you through our pricing models. We have five plans to choose from: Free, Basic, Traction, Growth, and Enterprise. The Free plan is suitable for small-scale pilots or testing, while the Basic plan is ideal for small to medium-sized businesses. The Traction and Growth plans are designed for larger businesses, and the Enterprise plan is a customized solution for large-scale enterprises like yours. We also offer discounts for larger enterprises and a free trial to test our platform.

messages.user: John, Head of Digital Transformation at Schneider Electric
messages.content: That sounds interesting, but we're concerned about the customization and implementation process. We have a large-scale enterprise budget, but we need to ensure that the platform can be implemented quickly and efficiently.

I completely understand your concerns, John. We'll provide you with a customized proposal outlining the scope of work, timeline, and pricing. We'll also assign a dedicated customer success manager to ensure a smooth implementation and provide ongoing support. And, to give you a better understanding of the ROI, I can provide a customized calculation based on your specific needs and goals.

messages.user: John, Head of Digital Transformation at Schneider Electric
messages.content: That sounds reassuring. Can you tell me more about the ROI calculation and how it will benefit our business?

One of our clients in the energy sector saw a 30% reduction in churn rates and a 25% increase in customer satisfaction after implementing our platform. We can provide a similar calculation for your business, taking into account your specific pain points and goals. We're confident that our platform can deliver significant value to your business.

messages.user: John, Head of Digital Transformation at Schneider Electric
messages.content: I see. We're looking to close this deal within the next 6-8 weeks. Can you provide us with a plan that meets our timelines and budget constraints?

Yes, of course. Based on our discussion, I recommend our Enterprise plan, which can be customized to meet your specific needs and goals. We can also provide a phased implementation to ensure that we meet your timelines. In terms of budget, we can work together to find a solution that fits your budget constraints.

messages.user: John, Head of Digital Transformation at Schneider Electric
messages.content: That sounds good. Our key performance indicators for this project are reducing churn rates, increasing customer satisfaction, and meeting our sustainability goals. Can you tell me how your platform will help us achieve these KPIs?

Our platform is designed to help businesses like yours achieve their KPIs. With our Interactive Guides, Analytics, Training, and Performance Support features, we can help you reduce churn rates, increase customer satisfaction, and meet your sustainability goals. We'll also provide you with regular progress reports and insights to ensure that you're on track to meet your KPIs.

messages.user: John, Head of Digital Transformation at Schneider Electric
messages.content: I think we're getting close to a deal. Our financial priorities are to reduce costs and increase revenue. Can you tell me how your platform will help us achieve these priorities?

Our platform is designed to help businesses like yours reduce costs and increase revenue. By improving customer experience and increasing energy efficiency, you can reduce churn rates and increase customer satisfaction, leading to increased revenue. We'll also provide you with a customized ROI calculation to ensure that you're getting the best possible value from our platform.

messages.user: John, Head of Digital Transformation at Schneider Electric
messages.content: I think we're ready to move forward. What are the next steps?

I'm glad to hear that, John. The next steps would be to finalize the customized proposal and pricing plan, and then we can schedule a meeting with your decision committee to answer any further questions and finalize the deal. I'll also provide you with a copy of the presentation and video we reviewed during the demo call for your reference.

messages.content: Hi John, Head of Digital Transformation at Schneider Electric. Thank you for your time today. I'm excited to discuss how Whatfix can help you improve customer experience and increase energy efficiency. As we discussed during the demo, I understand that reducing churn rates and meeting sustainability goals are key priorities for Schneider Electric. Can you tell me a little bit more about what you mean by these challenges and how they're impacting your business?

Yes, certainly. We're struggling to reduce our carbon footprint and meeting our sustainability goals. High churn rates are also a major concern for us. We believe that Whatfix's digital adoption platform can help us address these challenges. However, we do have some concerns about the pricing model and the customization and implementation process.

I completely understand your concerns, John. Our pricing model is based on the number of users and the level of customization you need. We have a tiered pricing structure, with discounts for larger enterprises like yours. We also offer a free trial and a pilot program to help you test our platform and see the ROI for yourself. In terms of customization and implementation, we'll provide you with a customized proposal outlining the scope of work, timeline, and pricing. You'll have a dedicated customer success manager to ensure a smooth implementation and to provide ongoing support.

I appreciate your clarification on the pricing model. However, we're still concerned about the time and resources required to implement the platform. Can you provide us with a more detailed implementation plan and timeline?

Absolutely, John. We understand the importance of a seamless implementation process. I'd be happy to provide you with a customized implementation plan and timeline that meets your specific needs and goals. We can also offer a phased implementation to ensure that we meet your timelines. In terms of ROI, I can provide you with a customized ROI calculation based on your specific needs and goals. For example, one of our clients in the energy sector saw a 30% reduction in churn rates and a 25% increase in customer satisfaction after implementing our platform.

That sounds promising. However, we need to discuss the contract terms and procurement concerns. Our procurement team is quite stringent, and we need to ensure that the contract meets their requirements.

I completely understand, John. We've worked with large enterprises like yours before and are familiar with the procurement process. I'd be happy to provide you with a contract that meets your procurement team's requirements. We can also offer some concessions on the pricing to address your budget constraints. We're open to negotiating a mutually beneficial agreement.

I think we're making good progress. There are a few more stakeholders involved in the final decision, including our CFO and CIO. Can you provide us with some case studies and success stories that we can share with them?

Absolutely, John. I'd be happy to provide you with some case studies and success stories that demonstrate the ROI and benefits of implementing our digital adoption platform. We've had great success with clients in the energy sector, and I'm confident that we can do the same for Schneider Electric. Would you like me to schedule a follow-up call with your CFO and CIO to address any questions or concerns they may have?
That would be great, thank you. I think we're close to reaching an agreement. Let's discuss the next steps and timelines.

Sounds good, John. I'll send over a revised contract that addresses your procurement concerns and includes the concessions we discussed. We can schedule a follow-up call with your CFO and CIO for next week to address any final questions or concerns. Assuming everything goes smoothly, we can aim to finalize the agreement within the next 6-8 weeks. Does that sound good to you?
